dialog.text: -Gosh, I'm all out of food and water. I need to get out of here and get to Safety.
-And I've only got one bullet left.
-Luckily, It's a Zambie skull seeking bullet, and it will follow the mouse cursor after being fired, killing all the zambies on it's path.
-I think I should be heading north.
-I think I shouldn't be going into the forest. It's probably swarmed with zambies.
